name: SUPER SNAKE BROS 2023
description:
The game is currently in the development phase and this is the first version published.

It is played by 2 people.

The green snake is controlled with the keys: WASD while the red one has controlled with num 8456 keys.

The snakes are free to walk over themselves but if a snake intersects another, the one hits get damaged and lose half of its length.

We also added another feature of special baits. Special baits are colored blue and if a snake eats it, it generates a block of wall on the random coordinates of the arena in the same color as the player who ate the special bait. 

Basically, snakes can pass through the blocks with the same color as themselves while these blocks hit damage to the different colored snakes. So the more you eat special baits, the more danger you create for your opponent.

If a snake's length is reduced to 1 block it loses one of its lives and after 3 frames pass, the snake goes back to the starting length.
